prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with vibrant green leaves and a charming smile.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves from a small seed into a giant plant creature.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon that thrives in forests and grasslands.
Generate a creature that has a unique combination of floral and reptilian features.
Design a middle evolution Pokemon that embodies both strength and nature.
Make a Pokemon that has a bulb on its back with blooming flowers.
Give me an example of a Pokemon that is friendly and loves to play in the sun.
